creator: apachebugs@mstier.de
text:
trunk rev 1340061

test fails because port 8081 is already in use:

org.apache.jmeter.protocol.http.sampler.TestHTTPSamplersAgainstHttpMirrorServerjava.lang.Exception: Could not start mirror server on port: 8081.

creator: p.mouawad@ubik-ingenierie.com
text:
AFAIK this would required some mechanism to configure clients of mirror server.
I don't see big ROI on this.
